full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 AFFIDAVIT CONCERNING THE BIRTH CERTIFICATE FOR : LEE, CHUN WING TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN We, the witneesses having names and other Identification and registration details as follow: 1- Name : TANG so CHING Date of birth : 10-18-1910 Alien Registration No : A35675911 Relationship to LEE, CHUN WING : Mother in-law Address : 4862 LYNNFIELD ST. LA,CA 90032 U.S.A. 2-Name : LAU, WING WA Date of birth : 05-01-1931 Alien Registration No. : FOIA (b)(6) Relationship to LEE, CHUN WING : Friend Address : 2100 N. EASTERN AVE. L.A, CA. 90032 U.S.A. We do hereby affirm that Lee, Chun Wing is an U.S. citizen and his certificate of naturalization number is 14147780. Lee, Chun Wing was born on July 16,1943 in Macau, his mother is FONG, WAI CHING and his father is: LEE, YING WAH (Deceased) We swear under penalty of perjury that above statement is true and correct to the best of our knowledge and at the time that Mrs. FONG WAI CHING gave birth to LEE, CHUN WING on 07-16-1943 at home - of No. 24 CHEN LOK LAND, MACAU we did go there to visit both of them. City of Los Angeles State of California Executed at Los Angeles on7-16-91 Subscribed and sworn to before me this The first witness: 17th day of July , 1991 , Notary Public: Fengrich Tang so ching My comm. Expires On: MAR 16, 1993 : The second witness: w mf wach gan OFFICIAL SEAL FENG YI WU NOTARY PUBLIC CALIFORNIA LOS ANGELES COUNTY My comm. expires MAR 16; 1993
